 Chalice and Censer) and a rosary Syrian Christian Ritual Vessels (Paten

physical_appearance:The image shows a set of items
 comprising of a rosary
 a chalice
 a paten
 and a censer. The rosary includes a wooden cross attached to red and white beads. The chalice has a wider base than its top
 with a narrow neck joining the two. It is silver in colour. The chalice has spherical bases and it has a yellowish tint on its silvery surface. The silver-coloured censer comes with chains and it has five holes on its body. The lower part of the censer looks ot be a little brownish. A holder is linked to the censer by the silver-coloured chains.

metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a set of items, comprising of a rosary, a chalice, a paten, and a censer. The rosary includes a wooden cross attached to red and white beads. The chalice has a wider base than its top, with a narrow neck joining the two. It is silver in colour. The chalice has spherical bases and it has a yellowish tint on its silvery surface. The silver-coloured censer comes with chains and it has five holes on its body. The lower part of the censer looks ot be a little brownish. A holder is linked to the censer by the silver-coloured chains.
